title: Immortality In Metaverse: Exploring Social, Legal & Psychological Challenges - Live Law - Indian Legal News
summary:
Immortality In Metaverse: Exploring Social, Legal & Psychological Challenges

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

As technology advances, the concept of immortality within the metaverse raises unique social, legal, and psychological challenges. This research analyzes the implications of having AI-driven avatars that may continue to exist and operate long after a user's physical death.

  • The metaverse combines AI, AR, VR, and blockchain technologies to create immersive digital environments.
  • Increased life expectancy has led to discussions on digital immortality, where avatars may represent deceased users.
  • Concerns include avatar autonomy, potential identity manipulation, and the need for global regulatory frameworks.
  • The paper explores the ethical implications of avatars carrying on after users' deaths, raising questions about liability and privacy.
‚ÄúThe soul is immortal‚Äù - a sentiment that echoes both socially and legally as we consider digital legacies.

The future of digital immortality in the metaverse remains uncertain but poses significant questions about identity, ethics, and the essence of being human.

Sony settles US consumer lawsuit over PlayStation game sales - The Hindu
summary:
Sony Settles Lawsuit Over PlayStation Game Sales

Date: December 17, 2024
Source: The Hindu

Sony has agreed to settle a federal lawsuit over digital game sales for its PlayStation console, which claimed customers were made to overpay for games.

  • Sony will distribute $7.85 million in electronic credits to affected PlayStation customers.
  • The lawsuit was filed by plaintiffs estimating a class size of over 4.4 million individuals.
  • The case centers on Sony's restrictions that barred retailers from offering game-specific vouchers.
  • Sony denied any wrongdoing but agreed to settle to avoid further litigation costs.
  • The settlement will cover purchases from April 2019 to December 2023.
‚ÄúThey said they will ask the court to award them up to about 33% of the settlement for legal fees, or about $2.61 million.‚Äù

The settlement awaits approval in court, marking a significant moment for PlayStation customers impacted by high game prices.
newTitle: Sony Settles Lawsuit Over PlayStation Game Sales

title: Google to launch gen AI experiment 'Whisk' today: 'Now prompt with images' | Mint - Mint
summary:
Google to launch gen AI experiment ‚ÄôWhisk‚Äô today: ‚ÄôNow prompt with images‚Äô

Publication Date: Today

Source: Live Mint

Google introduces Whisk, a new creative tool that allows users to input images and remix them to create unique items like digital plushies and stickers. The platform utilizes the Gemini model and Imagen 3 for image generation and creative exploration.

  • Users can input images for subjects, scenes, and styles.
  • Whisk automatically generates captions for images and captures their essence rather than simply replicating them.
  • The tool allows easy remixing of elements, facilitating innovative visual exploration.
  • Generated images may differ from expectations due to the extraction of key features alone.
  • Designed for fast exploration, Whisk encourages experimentation rather than precise editing.
‚ÄúThe goal is to enable users to explore ideas innovatively, allowing them to experiment with numerous options.‚Äù

Whisk represents a shift in how users can create and explore digital content, opening new avenues for creativity.
newTitle: Google Launches Gen AI Experiment 'Whisk' Enabling Image-Based Prompts

title: Google debuts Veo 2 video generator, upgraded Imagen 3 - SiliconANGLE News
summary:
Google debuts Veo 2 video generator, upgraded Imagen 3 with Whisk remix tool

Published on: Today | Source: SiliconANGLE

Google LLC has introduced Veo 2, an AI model that generates high-resolution videos up to two minutes long, alongside an upgraded version of Imagen 3 and a new remix tool called Whisk.

  • Veo 2 creates videos from natural language prompts, allowing users to describe scenes in detail.
  • The model can simulate camera settings and apply cinematic effects, producing 4K resolution clips.
  • In testing, Veo 2 outperformed competitors on overall preference and accuracy in following prompts.
  • The new version of Imagen 3 offers improved image quality and adherence to user prompts.
  • Whisk allows users to remix images, applying styles from one image to another's background.
‚ÄúIt brings an improved understanding of real-world physics and the nuances of human movement and expression,‚Äù said A√§ron van den Oord, research scientist at Google DeepMind.

Veo 2 will initially be available through Google Labs, with plans for integration into products like YouTube Shorts and Google Cloud's Vertex AI.
newTitle: Google Unveils Veo 2 and Upgrades Imagen 3 with Whisk Tool

title: WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls: Know More - News18
summary:
WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls

Date: December 16, 2024 Source: News18

WhatsApp is enhancing its app for iPhone users by introducing a dialer tab, aimed at consolidating messaging and calling functions within the app, allowing users to make calls directly from it.

  • WhatsApp will introduce a dialer tab for iPhone users.
  • This feature allows users to call others without leaving the WhatsApp app.
  • The dialer will open when clicking the + icon on the WhatsApp feed.
  • The feature is also aimed to enhance the app's integration for users, as available on Android.
  • WhatsApp will limit calls to the app's ecosystem, potentially creating issues in regions heavily reliant on traditional calling.
  • Recent updates have improved video call quality and group calling functionalities.
‚ÄúHaving its own dialer app means WhatsApp users don‚Äôt need to rely on the default dialer that is provided by Google and Apple.‚Äù

This new dialer feature aims to provide a more integrated experience for WhatsApp users on iPhones, though it may have limitations in markets where traditional phones dominate.
newTitle: WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls

OpenAI has announced that all free, logged-in ChatGPT users can now access ChatGPT search globally across all platforms.

Windows Users Can Finally Share Files With iPhones: All Details - News18
summary:
Windows Users Can Finally Share Files With iPhones: All Details

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 19:49 IST

Microsoft has introduced a major update to its file-sharing capabilities, making it easier than ever for iPhone users to share files with their Windows desktops or laptops. By leveraging Phone Link and Link to Windows apps, the tech giant is bridging the gap between iPhones and PCs, facilitating smoother collaboration between the two platforms.

  • The Phone Link app now supports file transfers between iPhones and Windows PCs.
  • This feature is currently available only to Windows Insiders with plans for a broader rollout.
  • Users must have compatible versions of iOS and the Windows Phone Link app to share files.
  • File sharing can be done by selecting the ‚ÄúLink to Windows‚Äù option.
  • The feature is still in testing, with feedback being collected via the Feedback Hub.
‚ÄúWindows and iOS devices have never got along well but things could be changing with the new update.‚Äù

This update highlights Microsoft's commitment to enhancing interoperability between devices and improving user experience in file sharing.

title: Google Introduces Veo and Imagen 3 for Advanced Media Generation on Vertex AI - InfoQ.com
summary:
Google Introduces Veo and Imagen 3 for Advanced Media Generation on Vertex AI

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Google Cloud Blog

Google Cloud has introduced Veo and Imagen 3, two new generative AI models available on its Vertex AI platform. Veo generates high-definition videos from text or image prompts, while Imagen 3 creates detailed, lifelike images.

  • Veo is Google DeepMind‚Äôs most advanced video generation model, creating high-definition videos that maintain realism and consistency.
  • Imagen 3 delivers high-quality image generation with fewer visual artifacts and includes editing and customization capabilities.
  • Both models support safety measures, including digital watermarking and data governance.
  • Companies like WPP and Agoda are already testing these models for marketing applications.

This is a huge step forward! With Google‚Äôs Veo and Imagen 3, the possibilities for video and image generation are expanding rapidly.

For businesses interested in using Veo, they can contact their Google Cloud representative for access.
newTitle: Google Introduces Veo and Imagen 3 for Advanced Media Generation on Vertex AI

title: Cheaper 5G smartphones ramp up volumes - The Economic Times
summary:
Cheaper 5G Smartphones Ramp Up Volumes

Publication Date: [Publication Date Not Available] Source: [Source Not Available]

5G smartphone prices are declining, leading to increased sales volumes in India. Despite a fall in average selling prices, the market is witnessing a surge in the demand for affordable 5G devices.

  • Prices of 5G smartphones have declined by 20% year-on-year.
  • 37 million 5G smartphones were shipped in the September quarter, with their market share rising to 83% from 57% a year ago.
  • New affordable 5G models priced between Rs 10,000 and Rs 20,000 are driving consumer interest.
  • A significant increase in the market share during the festive season coincides with the doubling of 5G handsets in the $100-200 mass segment.
  • Forecasts suggest even lower prices with upcoming sub-Rs 10,000 models expected in 2025.
‚ÄúBeyond the pandemic replacement cycle, the ultra-low-end 5G push to remain critical for the market‚Äôs organic growth in 2025.‚Äù - Sanyam Chaurasia, Canalys analyst

The shift toward affordable 5G smartphones appears to reshape consumer behaviors dramatically, signaling potential for future growth in this segment.
newTitle: Cheaper 5G Smartphones Drive Volume Growth in India

title: One UI 7 changes refresh rate settings for games - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
One UI 7 changes refresh rate settings for games - GSMArena.com
summary:
One UI 7 Introduces New Refresh Rate Settings for Games

Publication Date: N/A Source: SamMobile

Samsung has released the second beta of One UI 7, introducing a new feature that allows users to change refresh rate settings for games. Users can now select between 60 Hz and 120 Hz for a smoother gaming experience.

  • The previous One UI version limited game frame rates to 48 Hz for power saving.
  • New settings are accessible in the Gaming Hub / Game Booster app under "Gaming motion smoothness".
  • Games with their own refresh rate settings will not be affected.
  • Performance settings can also be adjusted individually per game, including maximum frame rate and resolution.
‚ÄúThis feature won't affect games that have their own refresh rate setting.‚Äù

In conclusion, One UI 7 enhances gaming customization, offering users greater control over their gaming experience.
newTitle: One UI 7 Introduces New Refresh Rate Settings for Games

title: Meta adds live translation, AI video to Ray-Ban smart glasses By Reuters - Investing.com
summary:
Meta Adds Live Translation, AI Video to Ray-Ban Smart Glasses

Publication Date: Monday, Date Unknown

Source: Reuters

The latest update to the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses features AI video capabilities and real-time language translation, announced by Meta Platforms.

  • The update, part of the v11 software, is available to users in the 'Early Access Program'.
  • The glasses can now translate speech in real-time between English, Spanish, French, and Italian.
  • The AI video feature allows the glasses to process visual input and provide responses based on what the user sees.
  • The integration of the Shazam app enables users to identify songs directly through their smart glasses.
‚ÄúWhen you're talking to someone speaking one of those three languages, you'll hear what they say in English through the glasses' open-ear speakers or viewed as transcripts on your phone, and vice versa,‚Äù Meta said in a blog.

This update marks a significant enhancement in the functionality of smart glasses, paving the way for more versatile and user-friendly devices.

title: Google DeepMind unveils a new video model to rival Sora - TechCrunch
summary:
Google DeepMind Unveils Next-Gen Video Model Veo 2 to Compete with Sora

Publication Date: Unknown

Source: TechCrunch

Google DeepMind has announced Veo 2, a powerful new video-generating AI aimed to outperform OpenAI's Sora, featuring enhanced resolution and extended video length capabilities.

  • Veo 2 can create videos over two minutes long at resolutions up to 4k.
  • Currently available in Google's VideoFX tool, it can generate videos up to 720p and eight seconds long.
  • Veo 2 boasts improvements in understanding physics, camera controls, and generating sharper images, especially with motion.
  • DeepMind aims to refine Veo 2 through feedback from users and collaboration with creative professionals.
  • The company addresses risks associated with generative AI by using watermarking technology and implementing content filters.
‚ÄúOver the coming months, we‚Äôll continue to iterate based on feedback from users,‚Äù said Eli Collins, VP of product at DeepMind.

In conclusion, Veo 2 represents a significant step forward in AI-driven video generation, setting the stage for competitive innovation in the field.
newTitle: Google DeepMind Unveils Next-Gen Video Model Veo 2 to Compete with Sora
